label: MISLEADING
title: there is a lot of research proving that lockdowns are useless
author: Zalman Shuher
content:
You need to know this. Especially those who are playing ′′ second wave ′′ again of quarantine
Now this is a common tool for use for useful purposes.
And in Ukraine  did any specialists and scientists express their opinion against of quarantine?
Haven't met.
Only we make noise on the expanses of FB.
I read it myself  let's go to friends. Opinion of Scientists:
quarantine is useless. ′′ You can deceive some people all the time  and all the people for a while  but you can't lie all the time."-Abraham Lincoln. After 3 months after the announcement of the pandemic  even people far from science begin to understand that the pandemic and quarantine have non-medical goals  Sergey Perelegin said this back in March [11] Today  the words of honest scientists who are being silent are with special power  because they are really inconvenient for the organizers of a disaster called quarantine and the blockage of the economy. • A study of scientists at Blavatnik University School on Efficiency of quarantine showed that the reduction of virus mortality quarantine was useless  but it was extremely effective for economic destruction. [1] • Epidemiology professor Sunetra Gupta from Oxford University said: We would have more success in epidemiological protection if we hadn't introduced quarantine [2] • Doctor of Medicine Nikolai Filatov from the Institute of Vaccines and Serums named after. Mechnikova said that quarantine is a useless measure  and Covid19 is the most common infection. In Moscow  about 3 million people get flu annually  more fatalities than from coronavirus  but we never said that the flu was a disaster and did not lock people up. Natural immunization of the population will pass  and everything will end. [3] • Camilla Stoltenberg  Director of the Norwegian Health Institute  stated uselessness of quarantine: ′′ After examining the actual virus spread statistics before and after the introduction of of quarantine  we concluded that of quarantine could and should have been avoided with more focused measures." [4 ] • Professor Eran Segal from the Weitzman Institute in Israel said the government is misleading people  talking about the advent of a second wave of the virus. This is not the second wave  this is not the end of the first wave that the government artificially stretched with of quarantine [5] • A study of scientists from the University of East England showed that a tough quarantine introduced in many countries had hardly benefited  but destroyed the economy. Scientists recommend restricting only mass clusters of people and continue to avoid quarantine. [6] https://www.bloomberg.com/graphics/2020-opinion-coronavirus-europe-lockdown-excess-deaths-recession/ • A study by scientists from the University College of London found that closing schools for quarantine has hardly affected the rate of virus spread. This measure helped prevent up to 2 % of all deaths. But the expenditures that the state and population of different countries were very significant. The closure of schools has negatively impacted the mental and physical health of children forced to sit in apartments for a day. Family savings have decreased seriously. [7] • Mathematics professor Itzhak Ben Israel from Tel Aviv University investigated the dynamics of virus spread in the USA  Britain  Sweden  Italy  Israel  Switzerland  France  Germany and Spain. Numbers showed that whether the country was placed in quarantine or lived a normal life  the coronavirus peaked at six weeks and remained silent by eight. Professor concludes: quarantine and blocking the economy is not justified and should be replaced with moderate social distancing. Every year  about 4500 people die from the flu and its complications in Israel  but we never declared quarantine (Certificate: 300 victims of Covid19 in Israel were 2020  28 of them died from Covid19  the rest of them from chronic diseases  having a positive test) [8] • WHO representative Maria Van Kerkhov said that governments should have limited the isolation of infected people with symptoms. That is  that quarantine  destroyed economy  destroyed families  businesses and lives were all unnecessary. [9] • WHO praised Sweden  whose population is now more immune than quarantine countries. Countries that have not introduced quarantine (Japan  South Korea  Sweden  Belarus  Turkmenistan) have not experienced negative development of events related to Karatnin. [10] Links: 1. justify: explanation although there are economic consequences  lockdown measures are effective in decreasing the spread of sarscov2
label: MISLEADING
title: there is a lot of research proving that lockdowns are useless
author: Igor Isaev
content:
Сергей Переслегин. Анализ пандемии коронавируса показал  что она распиарена и имеет цели далёкие от медицины.

1) Информационный анализ катастроф показал  что существуют:
• Простые катастрофы  когда количество информационных откликов соответствует норме или ниже её.
• Пропиаренные катастрофы  когда количество информационных откликов намного превышает количество жертв.

Примером простой катастрофы является Таншанское землетрясение 1972 года в Китае  в котором погибли погибли 655 тыс. человек  но которое получило слабое освещение в СМИ.

Примерами пропиаренных катастроф являются:
• Гибель Титаника 
• Теракт 11 сентября 2001 года 
• Чернобыльская катастрофа (абсолютный рекордсмен).

Пиар Чернобыльской катастрофы имел целью торможение атомной энергетики в пользу альтернативных.

2) График информационных откликов на различные эпидемии (см. внизу).

Красная прямая показывает норму информационной освещённости. Из графика видно  что:
• 8 эпидемий соответствуют информационной норме;
• недооценена эпидемия Чёрной оспы;
• несколько переоценена Холера 19 века;
• крайне переоценена пандемия Коронавируса – информ. отклик превышает количество жертв в 117 раз.

3) Психоисторический анализ пандемии Коронавируса.

Согласно данным ВОЗ  коронавирус имеет низкую патогенность и занимает последнее место во второй группе инфекций. По летальности коронавирус также находится в хвосте в ряду других пандемий (туберкулёз  спид  малярия  грипп).

Распиаренность пандемии коронавируса  на фоне его низкой патогенности и летальности  указывает на цели  далёкие от медицины.

Пандемия Коронавируса привела к переходу от "обезумевшего права" к ситуативному. Это означает  что правовые системы будут всё более усложняться  а их выполнение будет всё менее обязательным для правящего класса  оставаясь обязательным для остальных социальных групп.

Право теперь будет определяться ситуативными потребностями правящего класса.

Ссылка http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a9aUIH0nj0s

author: Partito Democratico
content:
′′ Democratic Party  Renzians and 5 Stelle have just voted AGAINST (House Budget Committee) the League's amendment that provided an economic prize for doctors  nurses and healthcare staff "  Salvini cries on social media. What do you do  not tickle the belly of the country by telling of a government deployed against those who are doing a huge job these past months in the fight against Covid? Effective controversy actually. If the news were true. Right  because instead we are faced with yet another fake news circulated by a senator  Salvini  who continues to ′′ fight ′′ to remain on the podium of the biggest buffalarians of this period.
Yes  because the Government  in the Relaunch Decree  has in fact allocated 250 million down to the fund to remuneration for the activity carried out that goes beyond the overtime work done during the emergency.
And the regions with own resources are already allowed to use up to twice as many of these allocated resources.
Many have already predicted bonuses and prizes. So an exhortation  Senator Salvini: less lies. Less cherries. More real data. People deserve the truth. Chiara Braga

justify: explanation the title of the article on the portal of one television manipulatively presented the statement of geneticist and university professor from bih damir marjanović about the origin of the sarscov2 virus  which he gave in the television program of the same media the manipulation added a tone of conspiracy theory to the statement and falsely claimed claim that the professor said that the virus may have been artificially spread  which he did not said after the reaction of professor marjanović  the title with the disputed claim was changed
label: MISLEADING
title: geneticist and bih university professor damir marjanovic says the new coronavirus may have been artificially spread
author: Prof dr. Damir Marjanović
content: There is now 15 years when we did a small genetic study and when we got interesting results for us scientists that fit into the paradigm of then European research. But free interpretation of scientific data primarily related to headlines that didn't have much to do with what was said  back in 2005  taught me to be strong  I repeat very careful with media statements... But those who did they seek sensation they try to find it where it is gone  and even when facts and words speak differently. Before trusting a title  it would be good to listen to the whole interview and try to find at least one statement of this ′′ all-known Marjanovic ′′ who expressed his opinion that the virus is ′′ artificial origin or agree that it was intentionally expanded ". Responsible and professional journalists from N1 television (whose professional approach I have so far convinced myself thousands of times) have just respected and corrected the original title that could insinuate it  and thank them for that. Maybe some other portals will follow this example. As I said in the past post  such titles and real ones from scientists ad hoc conspiracy theorists  what is not wise to do at this time that marks information eruption  but disinformation. But what's there  let's move on. Nikola thank you for the invitation  I enjoyed the conversation and I look forward to another guest.

May. 02  a. m. 7.40) Even though the government tried to shut down  the corona epidemic is spreading severely across Sri Lanka. Providing the best evidence for that  the Madamulana area of Weeraketiya  which was the village of Rajapakshala  has been completely closed today. The reason for this is that 9 corona infected people were found in that area. In addition to the south's Medamulana  Walasmulla  four-road areas have also been closed. 2 corona infected people have been found in the four road area. The most reason for the closure of the above areas is that the found infected were walking around the village. In addition  Central Province is the most endangered by now. A large number of infections have been found in the Kandy district of Central Province and many villages have been completely closed last night as they have also walked in many places. Puliyedda  Nahinawala  Nahinawala North  Katawala  Thalathuoya  Dambawela North  Bawulana  Kandakula  Villages  In Kandy district

As there have been a number of infected people from the above areas  the decision has been made to close these areas according to the recommendations made by the public health officials to the police to close these areas. content:
From Dr. Giampaolo Palma
HUMANITAS GROUP COVID-19 UPDATE
ON 10 April 2020: TRUTH!!!
NOT INTERSTITIAL POLMONITE
DISCOVERED DISCOVERED ERROR ONLY AFTER 50 AUTOPSIES!
My dearest friends 
I don't mean to sound excessive  but I think today  finally  is certain the cause of the lethality of Covid-19.
My 200.000-year experience in Echocardiography-Echocolordopplergraphy Vascular with more than 200.000 cardiopathic patients and not  makes me confirm what some were assuming  but couldn't be sure. Today we have the first data.
Patients go to CPR for Generalized Venous Thromboembolism  especially TEP Pulmonary Thromboembolia.
If so  CPR and intubation are useless because first and foremost you have to dissolve the thrombus  actually prevent these thromboembolies. If you ventilate a lung where the blood isn't coming  it's not necessary! In fact 9 out of 10. patients die
Gentlemen  Covid1 9 damages first of all the vases  the cardiovascular apparatus  and only then it gets to the lungs!!!
It's venous microthrombosis  not pneumonia that determine fatality! And why are trumpets forming? Because inflammation as per school text  induces thrombosis through a complex but well-known physiopathological mechanism. So what  then? What scientific literature  especially Chinese  said until mid-March  was that anti-inflammatories should not be used. Now in Italy we use anti-inflammatories and antibiotics (as in influences) and the number of hospitalized people collapsed.
Many deaths  even 40 years old  had a history of high fever for 10-15 days not properly cured. Inflammation here destroyed everything and prepared the ground for trumpet formation. Because the main problem isn't the virus  but the immune reaction that destroys the cells where the virus enters. In fact in all departments
COVID never came in sick with rheumatoid arthritis and that's because I'm in cortison therapy. This is the main reason why hospitalizations in Italy are starting to decrease and it's becoming a treatable disease at home. By taking care of her well at home  you avoid not only hospitalization  but also thrombotic risk. It wasn't easy to understand because the signs of microembolism are faded  even in the eye of an echocardiologist.
Comparing the data of the first 50 patients between those who breathe badly and those who don't  the situation has become very clear to all doctors in Italy  from cardiologists  radiologists  to anatom-pathologists and to colleagues in Intensive Therapies.
Time to publish these data and you could start getting the population out of quarantine  not immediately  but shorter than expected.
In USA where anti-inflammatories are still prohibited  data is now more tragic than in Italy. These are drugs that cost few euros but help save so many LIVES. These are the drugs we do to go on holiday in Kenya and prevent malaria to understand each other. This testimony of vasculitis with pulmonary thromboembolism results would be confirmed by the protocols of some other hospitals:
at the Sacco they damage Clexane to everyone  with predictive D-Dimer: the taller the pcs will answer.
at St. Gerard of Monza Clexane and cortisone
at Sant ' Orsola di Bologna Clexane everyone + protocol shared with family doctors prescribing Plaquenil rain on all pcs. monosymptomatic at home. Integrated with an anti-inflammatory statement: Brufen anti-inflammatory drugs  naproxene  aspirin that inhibit cox1 as well as Cox 2 should not be used 
While celecoxib (a selective Cox 2 inhibitor) seems to be delivering good results  we still need to wait for studies  instead this analysis shows the need to use in the intermediate stages of the disease (start of cough and before breathing difficulties) one Low molecular weight heparin at high doses... (Clexane 8.000 IU / day). Avoid (so as not to burden the exposure too much  and because the text is too medical) to report an interesting testimony from an anatomy pathologist: just think that Bergamo's ′′ Pope John XXIII ′′ performed 50 autopsies and the ′′ Sacco ′′ ′′ of Milan 20 (the Italian one is the highest case in the world  the Chinese have only done 3 and ′′ minimally invasive ′′). Everything that comes out seems to fully confirm the above information. In a nutshell  it seems that exitus is determined by a DIC (for non-doctors  Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation) triggered by the virus. So interstitial pneumonia had nothing to do with it  it was just a diagnostic mistake: we doubled the places in CPR  with exorbitant costs  probably unnecessarily. In hindsight  I think about all those Rx Torax we commented on about a month ago: those images that were interstitial pneumonia might actually be completely consistent with an INTRAVASCULATED COAGULATION.

author: Maia Butsashvili
content: გავრცელდა ინფორმაცია  რომ თამბაქოს მომხმარებლებს ნაკლებად ემართებათ ახალი კორონავირუსით ინფექცია. ამის ასე ხელაღებით თქმა ძალიან საშიშია  რადგან შეიძლება ადამიანებმა არასწორად აღიქვან და თამბაქოს გამოყენება დაიწყონ. საქმე იმაშია  რომ ფრანგული წყაროს მიერ გამოქვეყნებული ინფორმაცია  რომლის საფუძველზეც ეს სიახლე გაჩნდა  რეალურად რაიმე ბიოლოგიურ/საბაზისო კვლევას არ ეყრდნობა  ეს არის უბრალოდ სტაციონარში მოთავსებულთა გამოკითხვის შედეგი  რომლის საფუძველზეც რაიმე მყარ დასკვნას ვერავითარ შემთხვევაში ვერ გავაკეთებთ. პირიქით  არ უნდა დაგვავიწყდეს (და სხვათა შორის  თვითონ კვლევის ავტორებიც იქვე აღნიშნავენ)  რომ მწეველებში მაღალია სასუნთქი გზების ქრონიკული დაავადებების გავრცელება  ხოლო ის ფაქტი  რომ ამ დავადებების მქონეებს კორონავირუსით სიკვდილობის გაზრდილი რისკი აქვთ  უკვე ეჭვს არ იწვევს. ამ ინფორმაციამ საფუძველი დაუდო ახალ კვლევას ნიკოტინის კანზე დასაკრავი საფენების როლზე კორონავირუსით ინფიცირებაში. ამან საფრანგეთში მკვეთრად გაზარდა ნიკოტინზე მოთხოვნა და სახელმწიფო იძულებული გახდა შეეზღუდა ამ პროდუქტების გაყიდვა. ასეთივე დაუსაბუთებელი იყო იბუპროფენის ირგვლივ ატეხილი აჟიოტაჟიც  რომელიც არავითარ მტკიცებულებებს არ ეყრდნობოდა და ადამიანებს უარი ათქმევინა ამ ჯგუფის პრეპარატების გამოყენებაზე და ყველა პარაცეტამოლზე გადაერთო. მოკლედ  ასეთ წინაწარ მონაცემებზე დაყრდნობით არავითარ შემთხვევაში არ უნდა გავაკეთოთ დასკვნები  ჩვენს ორგანიზმს მეტი პატივი ვცეთ და არ დავიწყოთ რაღაც ნივთიერებების/წამლების გამოყენება. მთავარი პრინციპი დაავადებების მართვაში არის "არ ავნო".

The diseased version of the new coronavirus gene tree in the United States has evolved the longest in the world with 26 mutations 當世界正在全力抵抗疫情...同時亦有很多聲音質疑新冠病毒的源頭究竟是那裏，越來越多證據指明武漢並不是病毒的原始來源地！ 這編文章轉自微博大家可以作為參考(未經證實) 基因樹上的病毒突變個數證明美國的毒株版本進化時間最久，法國第二，中國連前三都進不了。 圖一：美國華盛頓州一個3月8日病例的毒株有26個突變-（原網站估計發現暴露了不得了的問題已把這條數據刪除，不過幸好我有截圖，跑不掉的，清清楚楚）
圖二：法國3月2日患者毒株有18個突變
圖三：中國突變最遠的一個2月26日香港患者只有10個突變 結論：基因突變越多證明這個毒株存在和進化的時間越久，美國華盛頓州這個病毒進化時間是中國突變最久版本的2.6倍，基因是不會撒謊的，病毒起源於美國。 再形象的講一講，好比原始病毒攜帶者是穿山甲，假設它把病毒傳播給了武漢市民，現在所有統計到的中國病例毒株突變都是10個以內。而現在出現一個美國患者的病毒有26個突變，說明穿山甲把病毒傳染給美國人的時間比中國早了2.6倍，如果病毒在武漢進化了3個月，那麼病毒在美國進化了起碼半年以上了。所以，正是因為病毒半年前就在美國開始進化，它早期的版本可能是弱傳染性，而到了武漢的版本就突變成了劇烈傳染性。 現在看來，病毒在歐洲甚至是南美的傳播時間都是久於中國的。 鑑於美國的數據被改了，看看法國那個突變18次的數據是3月2日採集的，而香港突變10次的數據是2月26日採集的，也就差了4天。說明法國的病毒多進化8個突變。
為什麼基因樹根上國外的數據少，因為國外篩查病毒查的晚，國外很早版本毒株的病人要么已病死或被當成感冒治癒了，但是國外查出來的毒株有很多比中國版的毒株進化的遠。 The diseased version of the new coronavirus gene tree in the United States has evolved the longest in the world with 26 mutations When the world is fully fighting the epidemic ... At the same time  there are many voices questioning where the source of the new crown virus is  and there is more and more evidence that Wuhan is not the original source of the virus! This article is transferred from Weibo for everyone's reference (unconfirmed) The number of virus mutations in the gene tree proves that the strain version of the United States has evolved the longest  France is second  and China cannot even enter the top three. Figure 1: A strain of a March 8th case in Washington State  USA  had 26 mutations-(the original website estimated that this problem had been exposed and the problem has been deleted  but fortunately I have screenshots  I ca n’t run  clear Clear)
Figure 2: France's patient strain had 18 mutations on March 2
Figure 3: The furthest mutation in China. Hong Kong patients had only 10 mutations on February 26. Conclusion: The more genetic mutations  the longer the virus has existed and evolved. The Washington state of the United States has evolved 2.6 times the longest version of the Chinese mutation. The gene does not lie. The virus originated in the United States. Let's talk about it visually. It is like that the original virus carrier was pangolin. Suppose it transmitted the virus to the citizens of Wuhan. Now all the Chinese cases have less than 10 mutations. Now there are 26 mutations in the virus in an American patient  indicating that pangolin transmitted the virus to Americans 2.6 times earlier than China. If the virus has evolved in Wuhan for 3 months  the virus has evolved in the United States for at least six months. . Therefore  precisely because the virus began to evolve in the United States half a year ago  its early version may be weakly infectious  and the Wuhan version mutated into a severe infectious agent. It now appears that the virus spread in Europe and even South America longer than China. In view of the fact that the data in the United States has been changed  look at the data of the 18 mutations in France collected on March 2 and the data of 10 mutations in Hong Kong collected on February 26  which is 4 days behind. This shows that the French virus has evolved more than 8 mutations.
Why is there less foreign data on the roots of gene trees? Because of the late screening of viruses in foreign countries  patients with very early versions of foreign strains have either died or been treated as colds. The Chinese version of the strain has evolved far.

justify: explanation dettol has been tested and found to kill coronaviruses such as middle east respiratory syndrome mers and severe acute respiratory syndrome sars however  the manufacturer of dettol  reckitt benckiser group plcrb  says it has not yet tested its products on the novel coronavirus and could not confirm whether dettol is effective against the new coronavirus strain
label: Misleading
title: dettol sanitizer can kill the coronavirus
author: Dettol UK
content:
31st January 2020 – Slough  UK – RB has become aware of speculation about Dettol products and the novel 2019-nCoV coronavirus. As this is an emerging outbreak RB  like all manufacturers  doesn't yet have access to the new virus (2019-nCoV) for testing and  as a result  are not yet in a position to confirm levels of effectiveness against the new strain. Our products have been tested against other coronaviruses (such as MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV) and have been found to kill those. Although 2019-nCoV is a new strain  this virus is very similar to other coronaviruses. We continue to work with our partners to ensure that we have the latest understanding of the virus  route of transmission and will test our product range once health authorities make the strain available.
As a global leader in health and hygiene  we continue to play our part in combating and containing the outbreak of the virus. To this end  we have donated £5.5 million in cash and products to assist in the mobilisation of medical staff to treat those affected and provide soap and hand sanitisers to hospitals in Wuhan to help contain the further spread of the virus. It is vital the accurate  evidenced-based information is conveyed to the public so they are properly informed about the importance of good hygiene at all times  but particularly during outbreaks.

Also arrested were two Chinese “Students” working as research assistants  one of whom was actually a lieutenant in the Chinese Army  the other captured at Logan Airport as he tried to catch a flight to China - smuggling 21 vials of “Sensitive Biological Samples” according to the FBI.

Oh  almost forgot. The research lab the good professor had helped set up? It’s located at the Wuhan University of Technology. Wuhan China is ground zero to the potentially global pandemic known as the “Coronavirus”which is both spreading rapidly and killing people.

This is Stephen Coonts international spy novel stuff happening in real life - and it has barely made the news.

justify: explanation saint lukes hospital has not issued this advisory
label: Mostly false
title: saint lukes hospital of the usa says consuming alcohol can reduce the risk of covid19
author: Saint Luke's Health System
content:
False reports are circulating that say drinking alcohol can reduce the risk of COVID-19. THIS IS NOT TRUE. Saint Luke’s follows CDC guidance: -Practice good hand hygiene
-Wash for at least 20 seconds  especially after using the restroom  before eating  after blowing your nose or coughing.
-If soap and water aren’t available  use a hand sanitizer with at least 60 percent alcohol
-Avoid close contact with people who are sick and stay home when you are sick
-Avoid touching your eyes  nose  and mouth
-Cover coughs and sneezes with a tissue  then throw the tissue in the trash
-Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces using regular household cleaning spray or wipe

author: Dr. med. Michael Spitzbart
content:
Has influenza died of SARS-CoV-2? If you look at WHO's statistics for influenza flu  this is what stands out: in recent years there has been a regular peak over fall and winter. In the summer  a weak flu occurrence could also be proven  which then rose significantly again in the autumn. However  the year 2020 is completely different. Since April  influenza virus has miraculously disappeared from the face of the earth. Possible explanation: Influenza sufferers have received new label and are all running under COVID-19. Something incomprehensible at the sight of this curve is called for flu vaccination. Against a disease that apparently doesn't exist anymore. Among us pastor sons and daughters: of course influenza flu continues to exist. Currently  however  only SARS-CoV-2 is in our consciousness. Time to develop a more relaxed relationship with this virus. Corona infections have been around for a long time  like influenza. Both will never go away. If you are allowed to believe the flurfunk in the Bundestag  the next lockdown for January 2021 is already planned. Another 2 weeks in February. If you put just a fraction of the money you are now pumping into the dying economy for the training and good pay of hospital workers and beds  the shortages that are recurring every year would not be an issue. Let's think of the renowned Prof. John Ioannidis  whose studies classify influenza and SARS-CoV-2 in roughly the same danger. Shouldn't we learn from him slowly?
